title: Chapter 1457 - The Ten Thousand Demons Imperial Talisman
body:
Chapter 1457 - The Ten Thousand Demons Imperial Talisman

Su Yi really was a bit wretched.

He’d run into a spacetime windstorm while crossing the River of Spacetime. Had he not circulated the aura of the Sword of the Nine Hells at a critical juncture, the raging spacetime power might well have ripped him to shreds.

“Forcing my way across the River of Spacetime without first stepping into the Immortal Dao really was overly risky.” Su Yi rubbed his nose in self-deprecation.

Fortunately, he’d reached the Epoch of Demonism safely in the end.

He let out a breath of turbid air, then looked around.

It was already late at night. The distant Ancient Wilds Demon Mountains were shrouded in darkness. The peaks rose and fell, like a massive dragon sprawled across the ground.

“I wonder if the Demonic Court of Ten Thousand Domains still exists.” Su Yi gazed at the distant Ancient Wilds Demon Mountains and sank into thought.

A long, long time ago, his sixth incarnation, Wang Ye, explored the Ancient Wilds Demon Mountains.

At the time, Wang Ye recruited a group of subordinates to help him uncover the origins of the Epoch of Demonism’s culture of cultivation. They were tasked with gathering ancient...
original_title: Chapter 1457 - The Ten Thousand Demons Imperial Talisman
